entry.title: Mark Johns - Bacardi - 가사
entry.content: V1: What’s strange is as of late, I ain’t been missing you the same. I think that all this time away, has made me feel outside the frame. I think I’m ready to dispose, to reburst go head first. To rebound, start a new round. My friends never liked you anyways. Bridge: I’ll open myself up to someone new tonight, then again I say the same thing every damn time. Chorus: When I leave the room, and I’m feeling naughty, you go straight to my head like a shot of bacardi. Not after, before, I walked out of my door thinking maybe I’ll give someone else a chance at the party. I went home alone (x2) Hit you on the phone (x2) Told you come on over (x2) Now we’re here again we’ll never hear the end of it. V2: God damn, don’t understand. I need to come up with a better plan. Or better yet just stop seeking amends. Find a better way to use my hands. You’re lemonade without the ice. We tried twice, but no dice. Come on now, girl, you got this. Your friends never liked him anyways. Bridge: I’ll open myself up to someone new tonight, then again I say the same thing every damn time. Chorus: When I leave the room, and I’m feeling naughty, you go straight to my head like a shot of bacardi. No after, before, I walked out of my door thinking maybe I’ll give someone else a chance at the party. I went home alone (x2) Hit you on the phone (x2) Told you come on over (x2) Now we’re here again we’ll never hear the end of it. I told my friends I would quit you. Put you down and dismiss you. So I guess here’s my issue. Man fuck you. Fuck you cause you know that I’m trying here and you don’t care, and you don’t even fuck me good you just fuck me over. Then get an Uber home and wait, you wait for me to call. And now we’re in this place again how am I in this place again?
